title: Nearly everyone on this board use the 'reply' button rather than the 'quote'
body:
When you use 'reply' button no one knows who you are talking to, only the person that you replied to will know.

But if you use 'quote', everyone will know who you're referring to, making discussions a lot more smoother.
PS. if you 'quote' someone, that person will still get a notification xd

tldr; use  'quote' rather than 'reply' at the bottom of each post
